schemes.name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
schemes.description: Direct income support of ₹6,000 per year to all farmer families holding cultivable land, paid in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each.
eligibility: Family definition: Husband, wife and minor children
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply online at pmkisan.gov.in or through Common Service Centers (CSC)
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
schemes.description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers in case of crop failure due to natural calamities, pests and diseases.
schemes.benefits: Up to 90% subsidy on premium for small and marginal farmers
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through banks, CSCs, or online at pmfby.gov.in
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.description: Provides adequate and timely credit support to farmers for their cultivation and other needs including purchase of agriculture inputs.
schemes.benefits: Interest subsidy of 2% per annum, additional 3% incentive on prompt repayment
eligibility: Tenant farmers, oral lessees and sharecroppers
Self Help Groups (SHGs) or Joint Liability Groups (JLGs) of farmers
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply at any bank branch or online through bank websites
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare & RBI

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.description: Provides soil health cards to farmers every 2 years with recommendations on appropriate dosage of nutrients to improve soil health and fertility.
schemes.benefits: Free soil testing and customized fertilizer recommendations
schemes.how_to_apply: Contact local agriculture department or soil testing laboratory
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

schemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
schemes.description: Promotes organic farming through cluster-based approach and certification of organic produce. Provides financial assistance of ₹50,000 per hectare over 3 years.
schemes.benefits: ₹50,000 per hectare for 3 years + organic certification support
eligibility: Minimum 20 farmers forming a cluster of 50 acres
schemes.department: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

schemes.name: PM-KUSUM (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan)
schemes.description: Provides financial support for installation of solar pumps and grid-connected solar power plants on barren/fallow land.
schemes.benefits: 60% subsidy on solar pumps and power plants
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through State Nodal Agency or DISCOM website
schemes.department: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy

schemes.name: Maharashtra Krishi Samruddhi Yojana
schemes.description: State scheme providing support for farm mechanization, irrigation infrastructure, and modern farming equipment.
schemes.benefits: 50-80% subsidy on agriculture equipment and infrastructure
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Maharashtra Agriculture Department portal
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Maharashtra

schemes.name: Punjab Minimum Support Price Scheme
schemes.description: Ensures farmers get minimum support price (MSP) for wheat and paddy with direct procurement by government agencies.
schemes.how_to_apply: Register on anaajkharid.in portal during sowing season
schemes.department: Department of Food & Civil Supplies, Punjab

schemes.name: Karnataka Horticulture Development Scheme
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for establishment of high-density orchards, protected cultivation, and precision farming in horticulture.
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka

schemes.name: Tamil Nadu Solar Powered Pump Scheme
schemes.description: Free solar-powered agricultural pumpsets to marginal and small farmers.
schemes.benefits: 100% subsidy for SC/ST farmers, 75% for other small farmers
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers of Tamil Nadu
Must have agriculture land with irrigation requirement
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Tamil Nadu Agriculture Department
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Tamil Nadu

schemes.name: Uttar Pradesh Sugarcane Payment Scheme
schemes.description: Ensures timely payment to sugarcane farmers and provides interest on delayed payments by sugar mills.
schemes.benefits: Guaranteed payment within 14 days + interest on delay
eligibility: Must supply to registered sugar mills
schemes.how_to_apply: Register with local sugar mill and agriculture department
schemes.department: Cane Development Department, Government of Uttar Pradesh

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
schemes.description: Provides subsidized micro-irrigation systems (drip, sprinkler) to improve water use efficiency in agriculture.
eligibility: Higher subsidy for small/marginal farmers and SC/ST
